goals__remit:
The British Beer & Pub Association is the leading body representing Britain’s brewers and pub companies. Our members account for some 90% of beer brewed in Britain today, and own around 20,000 of the nation’s pubs. These members range from international brewers, to market-leading managed pub companies, the nation’s largest tenanted pub companies and historic family brewers.  
 
The Association exists to promote and protect one of the nation’s most iconic and important industries and to work towards the conditions that support a thriving beer and pub sector, which has great economic and social importance to the whole of the UK.
